description: Google Firewall should not allow SSH access (port 22) from the Internet (public CIDR block) to ensure the principle of least privileges
expected_value: 'google_compute_firewall[allow-ssh].allow.ports' should not include SSH port 22

description: Service account should not have improper privileges like admin, editor, owner, or write roles
expected_value: google_project_iam_member[owner_binding].role should not have admin, editor, owner, or write privileges for service account member
actual_value: google_project_iam_member[owner_binding].role has admin, editor, owner, or write privilege for service account member

description: Instances should not be configured to use the Default Service Account, that has full access to all Cloud APIs, which means the attribute 'service_account' and its sub attribute 'email' must be defined. Additionally, 'email' must not be empty and must also not be a default Google Compute Engine service account.
expected_value: 'google_compute_instance[vm_instance_public].service_account.email' should not be an email

description: A VM instance is configured to use the default service account with full access to all Cloud APIs
expected_value: 'service_account.scopes' should not contain 'cloud-platform'
